professionalExperience.name: Fraunhofer Institute for Production Technology IPT
professionalExperience.description: Development and maintenance of cloud simulation interfaces, using React, Typescript, JavaScript and MUI on the front-end. Creation of microservices for automating engineering simulations with Python, focusing on parameter validation and CRUD operations. Management and integration of microservices in the cloud computing infrastructure, focusing on the organization and administration of parameters and dependencies. Development of microservices to unify simulation result files into a single structured HDF file, facilitating visualization and analysis. Experience with the acquisition, processing and analysis of data obtained during the milling of aero engine components, using LabView, DIAdem and GraphQL.

professionalExperience.name: HUAWEI Solution & Design Innovation Center - Facens
professionalExperience.description: Working as a FrontEnd developer of websites and systems, where every day I can put the skills in: JavaScript, VueJs, HTML, CSS and SQL to the test, always practicing and seeking constant improvement and learning.

professionalExperience.name: VCP Industrial Automation
